医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
了解咯咯笑失禁：原因、症状和治疗咯咯笑失禁是一种由笑引起的尿失禁的独特形式，主要影响没有其他泌尿系统疾病的儿童，治疗方案包括尿疗、生物反馈和哌醋甲酯。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Understanding-giggle-incontinence-Causes-symptoms-and-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Understanding-giggle-incontinence-Causes-symptoms-and-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=757ece1d-7fbc-4ffc-9bd7-8bfc44041410 Tue, 27 Feb 2024 20:39:00 -0500 Understanding giggle incontinence: Causes, symptoms, and management
GENERATE 研究：远程遗传教育提高遗传性癌症风险的检测率尽管人们越来越清楚，对某些癌症的遗传易感性比以前想象的更为普遍，但对癌症患者家庭成员的基因检测并没有像专家所希望的那样增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/GENERATE-study-Remote-genic-education-boosts-testing-rates-for-inherited-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/GENERATE-study-Remote-genic-education-boosts-testing-rates-for-inherited-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2fec743-294a-4d12-992e-87b4c3759773 Tue, 27 Feb 2024 15:09:43 -0500 GENERATE study: Remote genetic education boosts testing rates for inherited cancer risk
研究揭示近端和远端结肠癌的独特分子特征结肠通常被认为是一个器官，但结肠的左右部分在癌症中具有不同的分子特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Study-reveals-distinct-molecular-features-of-proximal-and-distal-colon-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Study-reveals-distinct-molecular-features-of-proximal-and-distal-colon-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe42cd51-16ba-4b3c-b65c-3f9b7d43e288 Tue, 27 Feb 2024 15:04:40 -0500 Study reveals distinct molecular features of proximal and distal colon cancers
大脑研究为失语症和自传体记忆提供了新见解当人们缺乏视觉想象力时，这被称为失语症。来自波恩大学医院 (UKB)、波恩大学和德国神经退行性疾病中心 (DZNE) 的研究人员调查了心理意象的缺乏如何影响长期记忆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Brain-research-offers-new-insights-on-aphantasia-and-autobiographyal-memory.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Brain-research-offers-new-insights-on-aphantasia-and-autobiographyal-memory.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5417e5d7-0c7a-493c-9184-88e277835aa3 Tue, 27 Feb 2024 14:49:00 -0500 Brain research offers new insights on aphantasia and autobiographical memory
麻省大学阿默斯特分校研究通过细胞再训练方法针对再生障碍性贫血马萨诸塞大学阿默斯特分校的研究人员最近发布了一项首个研究，重点关注罕见的自身免疫性疾病再生障碍性贫血，以了解如何训练细胞子集来纠正可能导致致命自身免疫性疾病的过度免疫反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/UMass-Amherst-study-targets-aplasia-anemia-with-cell-retraining-approach.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/UMass-Amherst-study-targets-a Plastic-anemia-with-cell-retraining-approach.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=598f7803-5664-4fd2-a391-131ec54dea5d Tue, 27 Feb 2024 14:42:46 -0500 UMass Amherst study targets aplastic anemia with cell retraining approach
碳酸氢盐传感受体的发现为缺血性中风治疗提供了治疗见解研究人员在脑壁细胞中发现了这种调节再灌注损伤的受体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Discovery-of-bicarbonate-sensing-receptor-offers-therapeutic-insights-into-ischemic-中风-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Discovery-of-bicarbonate-sensing-receptor-offers-therapeutic-insights-into-ischemic-中风-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c62a128c-538e-4f97-9dbc-c4d5db465e93 Tue, 27 Feb 2024 14:35:24 -0500 Discovery of bicarbonate-sensing receptor offers therapeutic insights into ischemic stroke treatment
DiaCarta 与 OncoAssure 合作推进前列腺癌检测商业化总部位于加利福尼亚州的癌症和传染病分子诊断测试开发先驱 DiaCarta, Inc. 今天宣布与总部位于都柏林 NovaUCD 的爱尔兰医疗诊断公司 OncoAssure Ltd 建立战略合作关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/DiaCarta-partners-with-OncoAssure-for-prostate-cancer-test-commercialization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/DiaCarta-partners-with-OncoAssure-for-prostate-cancer-test-commercialization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43abccf8-3e21-4d80-a9b3-d979a736839e Tue, 27 Feb 2024 14:33:00 -0500 DiaCarta partners with OncoAssure for prostate cancer test commercialization
探讨性别差异：女性寿命中的心血管健康差异今天发表在《美国心脏协会杂志》的“焦点”特刊上的一系列针对所有年龄段女性的心血管医学研究表明，女性在整个生命周期中的心血管疾病风险和结果与男性不同，美国心脏协会的开放获取、同行评审期刊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Gender-differences-explored-Cardioangio-health-variances-in-womens-lifespan.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Gender-differences-explored-Cardioangio-health-variances-in-womens-lifespan.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dcf798bb-135f-4a51-84f3-711b9af91661 Tue, 27 Feb 2024 14:26:42 -0500 Gender differences explored: Cardiovascular health variances in women's lifespan
梅奥诊所研究发现夏令时对心脏健康的影响极小梅奥诊所最近的一项研究检查了夏令时 (DST) 对心脏健康的影响，结果表明这种影响可能很小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Mayo-Clinic-study-finds-minimal-impact-of-daylight- saving-time-on-heart-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Mayo-Clinic-study-finds-minimal-impact-of-daylight- saving-time-on-heart-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53437579-25ee-4a02-894f-93ab7a5b3f79 Tue, 27 Feb 2024 14:17:51 -0500 Mayo Clinic study finds minimal impact of daylight saving time on heart health
创新的 Subak 工具为检测核酸酶消化提供了经济实惠的解决方案一种新工具可以降低诊断传染病的成本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Innovative-Subak-tool-offers-affordable-solution-for-detecting-nuclease-digestion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Innovative-Subak-tool-offers-affordable-solution-for-detecting-nuclease-digestion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=185de15b-4d77-43ee-b0a7-d7292de5061c Tue, 27 Feb 2024 14:13:16 -0500 Innovative Subak tool offers affordable solution for detecting nuclease digestion
